title: DORA THE EXPLORER - CLICK AND CREATE #12
description:
A couple of days early in the shop, nice!   OK here is #12 just got it today.   Some of you have been having problems running the games.

Well,  for what it&#039;s worth,  I copy all the files from the CD onto my daughters PC.  Then I &#039;create shortcut&#039; from &#039;main exe.&#039; and drag the shortcut to the desktop and rename it &#039;DORA #?&#039; so that all she has to do is double click to start.

Otherwise burn the files to CD or DVD and the &#039;autorun&#039; will kick in when you put it in the player and start it for you.
